import{React}from"react";import{Routes,Route,Navigate,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Header from'./components/Header';import SessionLogin from'./components/SessionLogin';import SessionView from'./components/session/SessionView';import DebugBoardView from"./components/DebugBoardView";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var navigate=useNavigate();var sessionId=sessionStorage.getItem('session_id');var participantId=sessionStorage.getItem('participant_id');var username=sessionStorage.getItem('username');var joinSession=function joinSession(username,participantId,sessionId){sessionStorage.setItem('session_id',sessionId);sessionStorage.setItem('participant_id',participantId);sessionStorage.setItem('username',username);navigate('/session');};var leaveSession=function leaveSession(){sessionStorage.removeItem('session_id');sessionStorage.removeItem('participant_id');sessionStorage.removeItem('username');navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{username:username,onLeaveClick:leaveSession}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{exact:true,path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SessionLogin,{username:username,onJoinSession:joinSession})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/session",element:!sessionId||!participantId?/*#__PURE__*/ // User not logged in
